summary: Contoso Wireless offers a TV product with access to hundreds of channels, on-demand content, and exclusive features like the ability to stream from your phone or tablet. They provide 24/7 customer service and a variety of plans to suit different needs and budgets. There are additional fees and charges that may apply, depending on the plan and usage, but they offer a money back guarantee if you cancel within 30 days of signing up. To cancel your subscription, simply call their customer service team at 1-800-CONTOSO (1-800-266-8676).
